post.body: Addams Family is def in top five pinballs... ever! Love that machine. I'm just happy Stern is making pinballs.
just got into Miami Beach. Chillin' at hotel doing some work then party time... i reckon
Just scored on some discs in ft lauderdale. Used star plastic wraith and beast and new roc like discraft disc do 15 bucks
In Austin for layover. Wish I had time to go to Hoover's. Stuck on same plane to Orlando though.
Just had yummy breakfast at Long Beach airport. Flight running late to Orlando. Orena tonight for Clippers game?
One last day of hanging xmas lights then off to Orlando/Miami tomorrow. Anyone else gonna be at Art Basel?
On way to Silverlake for Man Man video shoot, Teen Wolf style.
Just got review up from Amusement Park Convention. Lotta fun pics. http://tinyurl.com/5p3m7t
debating whether to try to put up lights or not today. supposed to be raining all day but pretty dry outside
Sweet, just got wristband for Rivers Cuomo show at Fingerprints tonight
Check out www.digforfire.tv for some of the coolest music videos, live performances and documentaries from some of our favorite bands.
wishing the Clippers could get their shit together. Done with lights and getting ready to hit the town. Prolly Prospector tonight
is really hoping the Clippers kick some ass in Philly tonight. Gotta wrap up lights early to watch game
Just landed in OC. Hoping to get an In n Out burger on way to xmas light job
At Orlando airport. Heading home for first time in six months. Delta just charged me $50 for a small bag?!?
flying back to Long Beach early in the AM then putting up xmas lights. Partying with old friends soon
One hour left. Got bucket of cotton candy, micro car racing, and found huge inflatable water slides
Back at expo. Costumes, rides, ride models, icees, and more
just got back from Amusement Park Expo. What a Day. On Scale of 1-10 for being overwhelmed, i was 9.7.
Just met Gary Stern from Stern Pinball, wow. I own a stern pinball from the 70's, Meteor. Only a quarter of way through closes in 2 hours
PANDA BEAR!!
Not sure if there's any better dinner entertainment than a Peruvian karaoke singer with a self styled puppet dancing along next to him
slinging at NIKE Art Damage party tonight. Panda Bear AND No Age. 14th and N Miami Ave. 9:30
Just passed shep wheatpasting some posters and a cop standing by
and...We've got a bunch of new shirts and merch. They make great holiday gifts! http://www.indiemerchstore.com/icecreamman
Ice Cream Man's newest newsletter is out, check it - http://www.icecreamman.com/newsletters/2008/december/index.html
Just found sports bar in Miami to watch Bama game. In for the long haul. ROLL TIDE!
Need to find places to roll to around Miami to sling. Roll Tide!
HELLO Asheville! Bout 30 degrees cooler than Florida. Hope my checked bag comes or I'm w/o a puffy jacket
Barely made connecting flight to asheville. For the record, terminal B is not the same as terminal D
rocking Fort Lauderdale. Flying out this afternoon on way to Asheville, NC for the week
ICM Holiday Party next Tues at Prospector in Long Beach - http://tinyurl.com/5rzn6w
Warren Haynes XMAS Jam in Asheville!
Just got tour of echo mountain studio where Avetts recorded Emotionalism. Played pinball and ping pong there too
Our Holiday Party is tonight at 10PM at The Prospector. Free cream, hot cocoa, and a bunch of great music! Soft Hands, Fast Dragon, URTC
Just measured my hair and it's over 9 inches long. Once its 10 I can cut and donate to Locks of Love, yay!
Welcome home to me! Almost to Long Beach
Heading back to LB from Asheville. Anyone wanna pick me up at LAX at 9?
May everyone be blessed with world class bacon this holiday.
Coffee Cup time. Been too long. Not sure if bacon, eggs, and banana cakes or Juan's Favorite.
I'm pretty sure Samuel Smith's Organic lager is my favorite beer ever
whoo hoo... just got credit card APR cut by a ton. Being nice on the phone does have benefits
is wondering how many people are at work today. I like to think a lot of people have the day/week off
Today is the laziest day in as long as I can remember
Flocked trees make the world a happier place. See's candy too.
Is it not healthy to drink more than two large Orange Bangs? Mmm....I miss el cilantro
Anyone wanna go to Clippers game against Toronto on Monday night? thinking $30ish for tix
Roll by LA Record party, 2225 Colorado in Eagle Rock. Blank Blue, Entrance, URTC and Free hot chocolate!
splitting in a sec. Ice Cream Social at Mtv in Santa Monica today. Hot Choco at LA Record party tonight!
